Name: GetSocketLocation
Description: Get world-space socket or bone location

Name: SetupAttachment
Description: Initializes desired Attach Parent and SocketName to be attached to when the component is registered.

Name: SetUsingAbsoluteRotation
Description: SetUsingAbsoluteRotation is a function in Unreal Engine that controls whether a component's rotation is treated as world-space (absolute) or relative to its parent component.

Name: GetComponentLocation
Description: Return location of the component, in world space

Name: SetWorldRotation
Description: Put this component at the specified rotation in world space.
